content.description:
Grap the sidepull and small pocket and place your feet carefully. Fire for the lower lip. Set the feet and pull through to the higher lip. Mantle. 

  Simple and straight forward. You can also do the problem as a run and jump, kicking off the wall.
content.location: This is near the right arete of the taller clean face on The Beach. Starts with a small but positive left hand sidepull and a small and shallow 2 finger pocket for the right hand.

content.description: Very sunny, sandy landing surface. Good rock. Square cut top on the right makes for good mantle practice. Both aretes are nice and a dyno. Will the lower lip traverse go? Maybe if it is cold enough and cloudy.
